data.name: Wacker Chemie AG
data.description:
CREATING TOMORROW'S SOLUTIONS

As a pioneer of modern chemistry, today we are a globally active company with state-of-the-art specialty chemical products.

Our portfolio includes more than 3,200 products. You, our customers, come from virtually every major sector. We develop intelligent solutions and innovative technologies for you.

Customer-oriented and innovative with a long-term vision, we aim to improve people’s quality of life around the world.

WACKER has joined Race to Zero, the UN’s carbon neutrality initiative. We want to pursue specific projects and measures to halve our greenhouse gas emissions by 2030 and to ensure that how we work and make products achieves net-zero by 2045

data.name: ELASTOSIL® M
data.description: ELASTOSIL® M silicone rubber has been the ideal solution for the production of molds that are highly elastic and have excellent release properties and optimum durability. These invaluable processing properties make ELASTOSIL® M indispensable, to both industrial and artisan mold makers.

data.name: SILFAR
data.description: SILFAR® is the name of WACKER’s range of silicone-based products specifically intended for the pharmaceutical and food industries, as well as for use in fermentation and other biotech processes. SILFAR® products feature outstanding chemical resistance. They are not resorbed in the digestive tract, and are therefore not metabolized. They are colorless and odorless.

data.name: CAVAQ10
data.description: WACKER’s CAVAQ10® is a highly bioavailable coenzyme Q10 powder. This fat-soluble, vitamin-like substance is a known antioxidant. Coenzyme Q10 has been associated with improved cardiovascular health and supporting optimum fuctioning of the cardiac muscle. However, many commercial products do not offer adequate bioavailability. WACKER’s cyclodextrin-encapsulated CAVAQ10® powder, by contrast, has an 18-fold higher bioavailability compared to other CoQ10 products.

data.name: SILRES

properties.name: Product Families
items: Other Crop Protection & Pest Control Products

data.description: The SILRES® brand comprises a wide range of silicones for coatings, paints and construction applications. The portfolio has been developed and continuously improved since the 1950's when the first silicone resins for building protection originated in WACKER laboratories. It features not only time-tested and innovative products, but also tailored solutions for a host of applications, climates and substrates. And it is supported by a range of extensive services available from our technical centers worldwide which provide further customization and customer-specific options.

data.name: CAVAMAX
data.description: CAVAMAX® is the trade name for cyclodextrins from WACKER. We are the only company in the world to manufacture all three naturally occurring cyclodextrins – α, β and γ (CAVAMAX® W6, W7 and W8). CAVAMAX® cyclodextrins have unique properties resulting in a wide range of functionalities, such as stabilization, rheology control, masking of bitterness or increasing bioavailability and much more. This paves the way for innovative food, pharma and industrial applications.

data.name: VINNAPAS
data.description: VINNAPAS® is WACKER’s brand name for a versatile range of polymer-based dispersions, powders and resins that are used to improve the properties and performance of products in a wide range of industries. The portfolio has been continuously improved and optimized since the 1950s. Thus, VINNAPAS® products set the standard and are leading in many applications.

data.name: BELSIL

properties.name: INCI Name
items: Crotonic Acid/Vinyl C8-12 Isoalkyl Esters/VA/Bis-Vinyldimethicone Crosspolymer

data.description: BELSIL® is an extensive range of premium-grade silicones intended specifically for personal care applications, and more especially for hair care, skin care, color cosmetics, and deodorants. BELSIL® products are developed and manufactured in the highest quality and with utmost care, ensuring that the formulations are highly efficient and reliable. With BELSIL®, you can tailor your hair-care or skin-care formulations or color cosmetics to obtain end products that are not only competitive but also meet the needs of the market.

data.name: CAVACURMIN
data.description: CAVACURMIN® is a highly bioavailable curcumin complex that is around 40 times more efficiently absorbed than standard turmeric extract. The complexation with the naturally occurring oligasaccharide gamma-cyclodextrin results in a free-flowing, easily dispersible powder.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® LR 3675/50 A/B
data.description: ELASTOSIL® LR 3675/50 A/B is a self-adhesive liquid silicone rubber of the ELASTOSIL® LR 3675 series. It is a paste-like, easily pigmentable, two-component compound with a short curing time and a low coefficient of friction. In comparison with ELASTOSIL® LR 3070 grades, the coefficient of friction is reduced by 50-70%. The vulcanizates are noted for their excellent mechanical and electrical properties. Due to the low compression set, there is no need to post-cure finished parts.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® LR 3071/30 A/B
data.description: ELASTOSIL® LR 3071/30 A/B is a self-adhesive liquid silicone rubber of the ELASTOSIL® LR 3071 series. This product is a paste-like, easily pigmentable, two-component compound with an extremely short curing time. Its vulcanizates are noted for excellent mechanical and electrical properties.

data.name: SILFOAM® SE 2660 SIMETH.EM
data.description: SILFOAM® SE 2660 SIMETH.EM is a medium- to high-viscosity antifoam emulsion that finds application in various industries. This silicone fluid emulsion, based on E 900, is exclusively permitted for use as a processing aid in food applications. It is crucial for food producers to ensure that only technically unavoidable traces of SILFOAM® SE 2660 SIMETH.EM are present in the final food product.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® LR 3842/60 A/B
data.description: ELASTOSIL® LR 3842/60 A/B is a low-oil-bleeding liquid silicone rubber from the ELASTOSIL® LR 3842 series. It is a paste-like, easily  pigmentable, two-component product with short curing times. Shortly after the curing process, a thin oil film with lubricating properties forms on the surface of the vulcanizates. The vulcanizates are opaque and exhibit good mechanical and electrical properties, as well as very low compression sets.

data.name: VINNAPAS® EP 1133
data.description: VINNAPAS® EP 1133 is a carboxylated, higher-solids vinyl acetate-ethylene (VAE) copolymer dispersion with a glass transition temperature (Tg) of 0°C. This product is a moderately soft binder that provides excellent adhesion to various fiber substrates, making it suitable for a wide range of nonwoven applications. Additionally, it has the ability to be crosslinked for enhanced performance.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® Color Paste PT Black RAL 9011 F
data.description: ELASTOSIL® Color Paste PT Black RAL 9011 F is a ready-to-use masterbatch comprising specific pigments and reactive silicone polymers that are commonly used to produce ELASTOSIL® high-consistency silicone rubber. This ensures a homogeneous covulcanization of the color paste without significant impairment of the physical properties (e.g. hardness) and without migration, as may be observed for systems based on silicone oil.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® LR 3070/50 A/B
data.description: ELASTOSIL® LR 3070/50 A/B is a self-adhesive liquid silicone rubber of the ELASTOSIL® LR 3070 series. This product is a paste-like, easily pigmentable, two-component compound with an extremely short curing time. Its vulcanizates are noted for excellent mechanical and electrical properties.

data.name: ELASTOSIL® LR 3005/50 A/B
data.description: ELASTOSIL® LR 3005/50 A/B is a liquid silicone rubber of the ELASTOSIL® LR 3005 series. It is a paste-like, easily pigmentable, two-component compound with short curing times. The vulcanizates of this product are renowned for their high transparency as well as their exceptional mechanical and electrical properties. Due to the excellent compression set, there is no need to post-cure technical parts.

data.name: WACKER® Catalyst AL-T
data.description: WACKER® Catalyst AL-T is a mixture of organotitanium compounds with alcoxysilane. It is a yellowish to reddish, clear liquid with a characteristic smell. However, it is sensitive to hydrolysis. WACKER® Catalyst AL-T is specifically utilized as a raw material in the production of RTV-1-silicone rubbers.

data.heading: Our solutions make a better world for generations

experts.title: Customer Service
experts.description: Please reach out to me with any questions, I am happy to assist you in finding the right product or learning more about our storefront

data.name: LIOSIL
data.html_description: LIOSIL® is powerful, innovative and trailblazing. WACKER is bundling its Protect & Care, Surface Care and Tissue products under the brand name LIOSIL®. Applications for these products pose an extraordinarily wide range of challenges for everyday home care and cleaning.
data.text_description: LIOSIL® is powerful, innovative and trailblazing. WACKER is bundling its Protect & Care, Surface Care and Tissue products under the brand name LIOSIL®. Applications for these products pose an extraordinarily wide range of challenges for everyday home care and cleaning.
data.seo_description: LIOSIL® is powerful, innovative and trailblazing. WACKER is bundling its Protect & Care, Surface Care and Tissue products under the brand name LIOSIL®. Applications for these products pose an extr

content_blocks.html: LIOSIL® is a high-quality, market-oriented brand of silicone products perfectly tailored to a variety of final applications. Whether they are used in laundry products, impregnation agents or wipes, these high-quality additives deliver highly valued characteristics, yielding surfaces that are hydrophilic or hydrophobic, soft, glossy, wrinkle resistant, quick drying and more.

data.name: LIOSIL® eco F 100
data.description: LIOSIL eco F 100 is a linear, non-reactive, unmodified polydimethylsiloxane with a viscosity of approximately 100 mm²/s. In its manufacturing process, LIOSIL® eco F 100 replaces 100% of fossil-based raw materials with renewable raw materials (biomethanol) using a REDcert² biomass balance approach audited by TÜV NORD. Thanks to its unique chemical structure, LIOSIL® eco F 100 offers exceptional properties that distinguish it from organic materials like mineral oils. Notably, it exhibits a low surface tension and excellent spreading properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® eco F 350
data.description: LIOSIL® eco F 350 is a linear, non-reactive, unmodified polydimethylsiloxane with a viscosity of approximately 350 mm²/s. During the manufacturing process of LIOSIL® eco F 350, all fossil-based raw materials are replaced by renewable raw materials (biomethanol) using a REDcert² biomass balance approach audited by TÜV NORD. Its unique chemical structure gives LIOSIL® eco F 350 exceptional properties that differentiate it from organic materials like mineral oils. Notably, it exhibits a low surface tension and excellent spreading properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® eco F 50
data.description: LIOSIL® eco F 50 is a linear, non-reactive, unmodified polydimethylsiloxane with a viscosity of approximately 50 mm²/s. During the manufacturing of LIOSIL® eco F 50, all fossil-based raw materials are replaced with renewable raw materials (biomethanol) using a REDcert² biomass balance approach audited by TÜV NORD. Its unique chemical structure gives LIOSIL® eco F 50 exceptional properties that distinguish it from organic materials like mineral oils. Specifically, it exhibits a low surface tension and excellent spreading properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® eco MQ 803
data.description: LIOSIL® eco MQ 803 is derived from the co-hydrolysis of tetraalkoxy silane (Q unit) and trimethylalkoxy silane (M unit). Its chemical structure can be described as a three-dimensional network of polysilicic acid units that are terminated with trimethylsilyl groups. Additionally, LIOSIL® eco MQ 803 contains residual ethoxy and hydroxy functional groups.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 110
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 110 is a self-dispersible polyether-amino-functional silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners. It is a technical-grade silicone fluid that can be combined with conventional fabric softeners, enhancing their properties. LIOSIL® FC 110 is easy to mix with fabric softeners, and its selected functionality significantly improves the hydrophilicity of fabrics, leading to increased water absorbency.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 130 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 130 E is a nonionic macro emulsion of a self-dispersing polyether-amino-functional silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners. It is used in combination with conventional fabric softeners to enhance their properties. LIOSIL® FC 130 E can be easily mixed with fabric softeners. Its selected functionality significantly improves the hydrophilicity of fabrics, leading to a substantial increase in water absorbency.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 201 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 201 E is a nonionic emulsion consisting of 60% Polysiloxan, specifically designed for fabric softeners. It is a one-component system that undergoes cross-linking at higher temperatures. The application of LIOSIL® FC 201 E provides several benefits for textiles, particularly cotton-polyester union cloth. It effectively protects the fabric from wrinkles and enhances the overall handle and ease of ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 203
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 203 is a self-dispersible aminofunctional silicone fluid with polyether groups. It is used in combination with conventional fabric softeners. Due to its special composition, LIOSIL® FC 203 enhances the hydrophilicity of fabrics, leading to a significant increase in absorbency. In addition, LIOSIL® FC 203 reduces the friction force during ironing, resulting in improved ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 204 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 204 E is a composition that contains a self-dispersing aminofunctional silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners in the form of emulsions. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 204 E enhances their properties. It is easily mixed with fabric softeners, improving their softening efficacy and resulting in fabrics that are noticeably softer and more pleasant to the touch. Additionally, LIOSIL® FC 204 E reduces frictional forces during ironing, making the fabrics significantly easier to iron.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 207 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 207 E is a nonionic microemulsion of an amino-modified silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners in the form of emulsions. This technical-grade product can be combined with conventional fabric softeners, enhancing the properties of the rinse cycle softener. It can be easily formulated into esterquat-based fabric softeners. LIOSIL® FC 207 E improves the softening efficacy of fabric softeners, resulting in fabrics that are significantly softer and have a pleasant touch. Additionally, it reduces friction forces during ironing, leading to significantly improved ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 218 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 218 E is a nonionic macroemulsion of a reactive, aminofunctional silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 218 E enhances their properties. This product is easy to mix with fabric softeners, allowing for convenient formulation. By incorporating LIOSIL® FC 218 E, the softening efficacy of fabric softeners is improved, resulting in significantly softer and more pleasant fabrics. Moreover, it increases the hydrophilicity of the treated fabrics. Additionally, LIOSIL® FC 218 E reduces friction forces during ironing, leading to a substantial improvement in ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 219 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 219 E is a nonionic emulsion of a silicone quat fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 219 E enhances their properties. This product is easy to mix with fabric softeners, facilitating formulation. By incorporating LIOSIL® FC 219 E, the softening efficacy of fabric softeners is improved, resulting in significantly softer and more pleasant fabrics. Moreover, it increases the hydrophilicity of the treated fabrics. Additionally, LIOSIL® FC 219 E reduces friction forces during ironing, leading to a substantial improvement in ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 225 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 225 E is a nonionic macro emulsion of a reactive, aminofunctional silicone fluid, specially formulated for fabric softeners. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 225 E enhances their properties. This product is easy to mix with fabric softeners, simplifying the formulation process. By incorporating LIOSIL® FC 225 E, the softening efficacy of fabric softeners is improved, resulting in significantly softer and more pleasant fabrics. Additionally, LIOSIL® FC 225 E increases the hydrophilicity of the treated fabrics, further enhancing their performance. Moreover, it reduces friction forces during ironing, leading to a substantial improvement in ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 228 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 228 E is a nonionic macro emulsion of a reactive, aminofunctional silicone fluid, specifically designed for fabric softeners. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 228 E enhances their properties. This product is easily mixable with fabric softeners, simplifying the formulation process. By incorporating LIOSIL® FC 228 E, the softening efficacy of fabric softeners is improved, resulting in significantly softer and more pleasant fabrics. Additionally, LIOSIL® FC 228 E increases the hydrophilicity of the treated fabrics, further enhancing their performance. Moreover, it reduces friction forces during ironing, leading to a significant improvement in ironing properties.

data.name: LIOSIL® FC 320 E
data.description: LIOSIL® FC 320 E is a nonionic micro emulsion of an aminofunctional polydimethylsiloxane fluid, specifically developed for fabric softeners. When combined with conventional fabric softeners, LIOSIL® FC 320 E enhances their properties. This product easily mixes with fabric softeners, simplifying the formulation process. Thanks to the specific functionality of LIOSIL® FC 320 E, it significantly improves the hydrophilicity of fabrics, resulting in increased water absorbency. Moreover, LIOSIL® FC 320 E enhances the softening efficacy of fabric softeners, leading to significantly softer and more pleasant fabrics.

data.name: LIOSIL® HC 303 E
data.description: LIOSIL® HC 303 E is an extremely finely dispersed water-based silicone emulsion with particles in the nanometer range. It can be easily diluted with water or incorporated into cold stirred formulations. LIOSIL® HC 303 E is primarily used as a polish in the home care sector. It is also ideal for impregnating natural or synthetic textiles in a washing machine.

data.name: LIOSIL® HC 303 E US
data.description: LIOSIL® HC 303 E US is an extremely finely dispersed water-based silicone emulsion with particles in the nanometer range. It can be easily diluted with water or incorporated into cold-stirred formulations. LIOSIL® HC 303 E US is primarily used as a polish in the home care sector. It is also ideal for impregnating natural or synthetic textiles in a washing machine.

data.name: LIOSIL® HC 603 E
data.description: LIOSIL® HC 603 E is a water-based silicone emulsion that is finely dispersed to an extremely small particle size in the nanometer range. It can be conveniently diluted with water or seamlessly incorporated into cold-stirred formulations. LIOSIL® HC 603 E is specifically manufactured to contain a low content of low molecular weight cyclic siloxanes, such as D4, D5, D6 (below 500 ppm).

data.name: LIOSIL® HC 621 E
data.description: LIOSIL® HC 621 E is a water-based silicone emulsion that is finely dispersed with particles in the nanometer range. It can be effortlessly diluted with water or incorporated into cold-stirred formulations without difficulty. LIOSIL® HC 621 E is specifically produced with a low content of low molecular weight cyclic siloxanes, such as D4, D5, D6 (below 500 ppm).

data.name: LIOSIL® MR 1003
data.description: LIOSIL® MR 1003 is a nonionic micro emulsion of a reactive, aminofunctional silicone fluid. It offers excellent softness and a good hydrophilic nature. It can be easily diluted with water due to its low viscosity. The product exhibits high substantivity on cellulose fibers and allows water vapor permeability.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 40 E
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 40 E is a microemulsion of a functional silicone fluid specifically developed as a softener for the tissue industry. It offers excellent softness and a very good hydrophilic nature. The product is easily diluted with water and exhibits high substantivity on cellulose fibers. It is a microemulsion.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 44 E US
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 44 E US is a nonionic oil-in-water emulsion of highly viscous polydimethylsiloxane. It is specifically designed for formulating tissue softeners. The active ingredient enhances the lubricity and softness of tissue. LIOSIL® TS 44 E US can be easily diluted with water to create a ready-to-use emulsion. However, determining the optimal conditions will require conducting individual tests. It is recommended to stir well before use.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 50 E
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 50 E is a specially developed microemulsion of a functional silicone fluid, designed as a softener specifically for the tissue industry. This product contains aloe vera, vitamin E, and a WACKER SILFOAM® antifoam agent. With its unique structure and orientation on cellulose fibers, LIOSIL® TS 50 E provides excellent softness and high hydrophilicity, resulting in a pleasant and gentle touch.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 533
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 533 is a specially developed aqueous solution of a functional silicone fluid, designed as a softener specifically for the tissue industry. With its unique structure and orientation on cellulose fibers, LIOSIL® TS 533 provides a good soft touch and excellent hydrophilicity. It also exhibits high substantivity on cellulose fibers. Additionally, this product has obtained BfR/FDA approval.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 533 E US
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 533 E US is a specially developed solution of a functional silicone fluid designed for the tissue industry. It offers a good soft touch and excellent hydrophilicity. This product is easily diluted with water due to its low viscosity. It also exhibits high substantivity on cellulose fibers, allowing for effective absorption. Additionally, it is permeable to water vapor, ensuring optimal breathability.

data.name: LIOSIL® TS 80 E
data.description: LIOSIL® TS 80 E is a specially developed macroemulsion of a functional silicone fluid designed as a softener for the tissue industry. It provides an excellent soft touch along with very good hydrophilicity. This product can be easily diluted with water and exhibits high substantivity on cellulose fibers.

data.name: Wacker Chemie AG
data.description:
CREATING TOMORROW'S SOLUTIONS

As a pioneer of modern chemistry, today we are a globally active company with state-of-the-art specialty chemical products.

Our portfolio includes more than 3,200 products. You, our customers, come from virtually every major sector. We develop intelligent solutions and innovative technologies for you.

Customer-oriented and innovative with a long-term vision, we aim to improve people’s quality of life around the world.

WACKER has joined Race to Zero, the UN’s carbon neutrality initiative. We want to pursue specific projects and measures to halve our greenhouse gas emissions by 2030 and to ensure that how we work and make products achieves net-zero by 2045

TOP_BAR.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search by chemistry, function, application and more

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Chemicals Marketplace - ingredients & raw materials - Knowde

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

FEATURED_SUPPLIERS.LARGEST_SUPPLIERS: The largest suppliers at your fingertips.

HERO.EASIEST_WAY_TO_SOURCE: The easiest way to source ingredients, polymers and chemistry.
HERO.SEARCH_SAMPLE_QUOTE: Search, sample, quote and purchase from 8,000+ suppliers

LATEST_SUPPLIERS.HEADING: Discover over 200k products in more than 8,000 storefronts.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
